reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with an oversized fit that's not too baggy. They describe it as super soft and cozy, with a cool pattern and awesome color. Customers appreciate its warmth, with one noting it's warm without being heavy, and they like its thickness, with one mentioning it's perfect for fall.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸ Obsessed With This Sweater!
items.body: I didnâ€™t expect to love this sweater as much as I do, but WOW. Itâ€™s even better in person! The material is super soft, warm without being heavy, and honestly so comfy I keep reaching for it. The print is what sold me â€” the grunge/eye design is bold, artsy, and just the right amount of weird in the best way. It fits perfectly with that slightly oversized, cozy look. Iâ€™ve worn it to work, out running errands, and even just hanging out, and every single time someone compliments it or asks where I got it. Itâ€™s definitely a statement piece but still easy to style. If you like unique sweaters with personality, this one is a total win. I feel cute, comfy, and a little edgy every time I put it on. Highly recommend! ðŸ‘ï¸ðŸ’šâœ¨ Read more
items.author: Sarah E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater!
items.body: My daughter absolutely love this sweater. It is oversized like advertised. She said it was slightly itchy, but in a good way. I wasn't sure what that meant, but that was what she said. It is true to size in her case. Material and color is as advertised. It is nice and warm for the up coming winter months. Read more
items.author: Justin Overby-Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm, Soft and Baggy
items.body: Nice. Most satisfying purchase recently. Larger than I had expected. Iâ€™m wearing two layers beneath it. Warm and soft. Read more
items.author: Alex

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy
items.body: Super comfortable and practical, if you like it a little baggie get it in your normal size, if you want it smaller go a size down, im a large and i should have gotten a medium as my preference but the large is still comfy and cute, super warm too! Read more
items.author: Kristina baskins

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater, Awkward Length
items.body: This is a great sweater, so cute with a cool pattern. The material feels thick and sturdy. The only issue is the length. It cuts off mid-stomach, although it isnâ€™t listed as a crop top. I have to wear an undershirt with it, which I likely would have regardless, but it is frustrating nonetheless. Aside from that, it is comfortable. I havenâ€™t had issues with shrinkage or pilling. Great sweater, just be aware that the length is a little odd. Read more
items.author: Amanda Mic Perkins

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fav sweater
items.body: The quality was better than I expected! Perfect weave and is super cozy and soft Read more
items.author: DeAndra Perrigo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: Perfect sweater. Fit is great. Color is awesome. So soft and comfortable. Lightweight but just enough. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is way off
items.body: The sweater is thick and nice quality. BUT, the description lists the small bust as 44.8cm/17.6" flat. The item I received measured 25" flat! If you want a thick oversized fit, this is it. But if you want something with a snug fit, keep looking. Read more
items.author: madhatti

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Purple, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Green Colorblock, Army Green, Dark Blue, Green, Chocolate Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
